channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Natural Gas Backs Off From Multi-Year Highs
item.description: Natural gas futures were down 6.4% early, backing off from a 2-year high hit Thursday and pushing prices back below the $4 per mmBtu mark.

item.title: Dollar Stays Firmer, Treasury Yields Fall in Calm Trade Before Trump Inauguration
item.description: The DXY dollar index rose in quiet trade as traders mostly held their positions ahead of Trump’s inauguration, after which the new U.S. President is e...

item.title: TD Bank CEO to Step Down Earlier Than Planned
item.description: The company is speeding up its change in top leadership, with Bharat Masrani leaving the post two months earlier than planned.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Rise, Led Higher by Tech Companies
item.description: U.S. stocks climbed, pulled higher by big tech companies and chip firms. Cryptocurrency stocks also rose thanks to bitcoin’s resurgence above $100,000...

item.title: Is SLB an AI play? Oil company’s CEO makes the case as power demand swells.
item.description: The stock of SLB, the oil-services company formerly known as Schlumberger Ltd., rose 3% early Friday after the company posted better-than-expected ear...

item.title: Oil prices on track for fourth straight weekly gain on supply fears
item.description: Oil futures traded a bit lower on Friday, but were on track for a fourth straight week of gains after wider sanctions against Russia’s energy industry...

item.title: Gold Futures Slip; Recent Gains on Weaker Dollar Might Not Persist
item.description: Gold futures slipped, as factors behind the metal’s gains have shifted away from safe-haven demand toward rate-cut expectations, Commerzbank said, add...

item.title: SpaceX’s Starship blew up. Elon Musk says it’s ‘barely a bump in the road.’
item.description: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk described the explosion of the company’s Starship spacecraft during its seventh flight test Thursday as “barely a bump in the roa...

item.title: He’s back! David Solomon gets $80 million bonus after facing doubts in 2023
item.description: Bank’s stock price hits record high this week and board awards Solomon stock bonus to vest in 2030.

item.title: White House says popular weight-loss drug Ozempic subject to Medicare talks
item.description: Analysts at Argus Research say the stock is now trading at 22 times its estimated 2025 earnings.
